title: Dead.Rising.2.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Dead.Rising.2.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release Info:


Year: 2010
Genre: Action / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer: Capcom Games Vancouver
Publication Type: Rip
Game Language: Eng |Rus
VoiceLanguage: Eng |Rus
Crack: enclosing (Xliveless)




System Requirements:

Operating System: Microsoft Windows (XP) / Vista / 7
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 Ghz / AMD Athlon X2 2.2 Ghz
Memory: 2 GB
Video Card: Nvidia GeForce 8800GTS / ATI Radeon HD 3850
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 11 GB


Game information:
City of Fortuna, the capital of entertainment, filled the walking dead.
From now on, every citizen of this vast metropolis - Party bloody
reality show and has to fight for itself.
Someone do it better, someone - is worse.

The protagonist of the game - Chuck Green,
a former world champion motocross. He - one of
those who are willing to fight to the last, despite
the difficulties and the overwhelming numerical superiority
of the enemy. During the terrible events in Vegas,
Chuck lost his beloved wife and his daughter Katie
was bitten. Save the girl from the zombie, he must
do everything in his power to give her a daily dose
"Zombreks." In addition, Chuck leads an investigation
to ascertain the reasons which provoked the invasion
of zombies on the Fortune.


Repack Features:

Dead Rising 2
Do not recoded
Cut rolls Mode Terror is Reality
(Because it is not available on the pirates)
Includes update 2
